name: in Nadja's world
description:
in Nadja's world
Nadja is my pet dog and she was raised on the streets of Sao Paulo before I adopted her. her name is an homage to Breton's second book, which ends with the sentence "beauty will be CONVULSIVE or will not be at all". my pet Nadja is the exact meaning of convulsive. This painting came to life as an automatic drawing exercise. I noticed the figure of a black dog ready to attack something and it clicked to me as the day that Nadja attacked an old lady in the street. 

"in Nadja's world" 2021
mixed media
4026 × 2810
